@zztop only a few, but most NTR just ends girl/guy gets taken awhile and raise their baby.
But yeah most NTR stories doesn't have much of an end beyond someone getting pregnant or them ending up with the other man and now I've ranted for quite some time here :D

Another one which is really messed up is one where the MC keeps trying to have a baby with his wife but she's never getting pregnant and she keeps blameing him for never getting pregnant. His work is getting to him and everyone else is bugging him for not getting her knocked up. So eventually he asks a coworker to sleep with his wife to get her pregnant. Then a NTR story starts because of this and the wife starts hating the husband for getting an NTR fetish and forcing her to sleep with other guys but then the kicker comes out that the wife was actually taking birthcontrol pills and was just doing it all to punish him cause she loves him but she loves seeing him being hurt the most. Then in the end they accept their twisted emotions and decide to be together but I believe the husband thinks their doing a real start over. Only to later come home and find another mans shoes at the entrance (hinted at being the coworker who had gotten serious and wanted the wife to be with him).

There is also another one where a family of a mom and two daughters are kidnapped then raped but also tortured and drugged I believe by a bunch of laid of workers but when they try to use it as revenge on the dad who fired them he just scoffs at them and say's he doesn't want dirty things in his house. Then for some reason the rapist is trying to hang himself after all he's done and it was all pointless since his revenge target doesn't care. But for some reason all the girls show ups and stops him and then seemingly lives happily with the rapist ever more...which is kinda messed up.

Another one is https://nhentai.net/g/311895/ in which Fumika from Idolmaster has a fling with the producer and they get caught then somehow she's forced to sleep with a bunch of ppl to make up to the label and move to the US to get some black dudes as her new producers who just keep gangbanging, selling her and making her do drugs until their eventually tired of her and she's sent back. Then she turns up at the producers apartment some time later in her new "look" with a baby to boot and demanding the producer to take responsibility for her and the baby. Which to me at least hints that she hates everything that happened and probably still loves the producer but she's completely broken now.
